Body:
hd = Boolean()
samples = get_many_samples_for(hd)
falses = Counter(samples).get(False)
trues = Counter(samples).get(True)
assert trues > NUM_TRIALS * 0.4
assert falses > NUM_TRIALS * 0.4
assert hd.pdf(False) == 0.5
assert hd.pdf(0.0) == 0.5
assert hd.pdf(True) == 0.5
assert hd.pdf(1.0) == 0.5
assert hd.pdf(-0.1) == 0.0
assert hd.pdf(1.1) == 0.0
assert hd.cdf(False) == 0.5
assert hd.cdf(0.0) == 0.5
assert hd.cdf(True) == 1.0
assert hd.cdf(1.0) == 1.0
assert hd.cdf(-0.1) == 0.0
assert hd.cdf(1.1) == 1.0
assert hd.min() == 0
assert hd.max() == 1
assert abs(hd.mean() - 0.5) < 1e-06
assert abs(hd.std() - 0.5) < 1e-06
assert abs(hd.var() - 0.25) < 1e-06
assert abs(hd.mean() - np.mean(samples)) < 0.01
assert abs(hd.var() - np.var(samples)) < 0.01
